quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, attempt to go to the south. Once you accomplish that, make an attempt to move east. And then, retrieve the key from the stand within the bedchamber. After that, make it so that the door is unlocked with the key. And then, ensure that the door is open. And if you do that, you're the winner!

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You are in a bedchamber. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can see a stand! The stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the stand you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] The stand appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
Look at you, bigshot, walking into a cubicle like it isn't some huge deal. You begin looking for stuff.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You've moved into an ordinary room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be ordinary. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the cookhouse.



 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You are in an office. An ordinary one.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
Look at that notice! What does it say? It says Welcome to the workshop? Well that's cool. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so normal all of a sudden, it's because you've just walked into the attic.

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] display.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The display contains [a list of things in the c_0]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The display is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the dish-pit. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You see [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet here.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_1]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You're now in a shower. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You are in a recreation zone. An usual one. The room is well lit.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a bed. [if there is something on the s_1]On the bed you can make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a steam room. A standard one.

 You can make out a table. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the table.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: door
infos.desc: it is what it is, a door [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: hatch
infos.desc: it's a robust hatch [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: portal
infos.desc: it is what it is, a portal [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: gate
infos.desc: it's a grand gate [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: display
infos.desc: The display looks strong, and impossible to break open. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to crack open. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: cushion
infos.desc: The cushion is brand new.

infos.name: stand
infos.desc: The stand is undependable.

infos.name: bed
infos.desc: The bed is solid.

infos.name: table
infos.desc: The table is unstable.

infos.name: stick of butter
infos.desc: that's an usual stick of butter!

infos.name: cashew
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that typical thing.

infos.name: paper towel
infos.desc: The paper towel is well-used.

infos.name: key
infos.desc: The key is cold to the touch

objective: You are now playing a profound game of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First step, make an effort to take a trip south. Once you do that, move east. And then, recover the key from the stand. And then, unlock the door inside the bedchamber with the key. After that, open the door. Alright, thanks!

main_quest.desc: You are now playing a profound game of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First step, make an effort to take a trip south. Once you do that, move east. And then, recover the key from the stand. And then, unlock the door inside the bedchamber with the key. After that, open the door. Alright, thanks!
